## Subroutine to evaluate ET(I)

```{r}
library(sintering)
library(dplyr)

data <- alumina %>% filter(Sample == "65")

YY <- function(B,AA) (1-B)/AA
Y<-data$y
T<-data$t
I <- nrow(data)
R<-I

#if (Y[1] -0 < 0.01) drop Y[1]?

##Find K
Sum1Y <- sum(log(Y))
Sum1T <- sum(T)
Sum1N <- sum(T * log(Y - T*Sum1Y/R))
Sum1D <- sum(T^2 - T*Sum1T/R)
XK <- Sum1N /Sum1D

##Find log A = C
SumC <- sum((log (Y) - XK*T)/R)
XC <- SumC

#if (XC > 88) do something
XA <- exp(XC)
```
